data.md:MetaData: Meteorological observations during Vasco de Gama cruise from Batavia to Antwerpen started at 1826-02-27
Ship: Vasco De Gama, Voyage: Batavia - Antwerpen, 1st Observer: A. Bezemer (Kapitein), Company: Particulier
CLIWOC: A Climatological Database for the World's Oceans 1750–1854 (and 10 more publications about CLIWOC results in the same volume)
